title: A Snake Priest
marks:
Title, Date and Inscription

ULC, printed in bro in lower margin, printed in brown: [A SNAKE PRIEST
description: an older native American man with chin-length hair and wrinkled face, wearing feathered headdress, white arm bands, shell necklaces and bracelets, and holding two feathers in his PR hand; man has white pigments on his face, bare chest and arms
creditline: Gift of Beverly and John Rollwagen
